mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_name as emp_name, e.emp_email as emp_email, d.dept_name as dept_name, g.grade_name as grade_name FROM emp e, dept d, grade g WHERE e.dept_num = d.dept_num AND e.grade_num = g.grade_num
